body:
Try `spack mirror create libpciaccess` then `spack install libpciaccess`.  The mirror creation successfully clones the repository and packs an archive, but the fetch does not find it. 

```
==> Trying to fetch from file:///users/scogland/trinity-mirror/libpciaccess/libpciaccess-0.13.4.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Fetching from file:///users/scogland/trinity-mirror/libpciaccess/libpciaccess-0.13.4.tar.gz failed.
==> Trying to clone git repository:
  http://anongit.freedesktop.org/git/xorg/lib/libpciaccess.git
  at tag libpciaccess-0.13.4
Cloning into 'libpciaccess'...
```
title: Git fetch targets fail in mirrors despite availability
